waterboards.ca.gov.description: State Water Resources Control Board - primary CA water quality regulator

water_issues_programs.notes: Hub for NPDES, stormwater, grants/loans, TMDLs, 401 cert, cleanup

npdes.notes: NPDES permits, general permits, permit search

drinking_water.notes: Division of Drinking Water (DDW) - drinking water regulation hub

safer.notes: Safe and Affordable Funding for Equity and Resilience

resources_fees.notes: Fee schedules for all permit types

water_quality.notes: NPDES and water quality fee schedules

sgma.notes: SGMA (Sustainable Groundwater Management Act) SWRCB role

about_us_contact.notes: Contact info, includes regional board directory

waterboards_map.notes: Interactive map to find your regional board

smarts.notes: Stormwater Multiple Application & Report Tracking System - CGP/IGP enrollment

ciwqs.notes: California Integrated Water Quality System - permits, violations, enforcement

geotracker.notes: Cleanup site and environmental data tracker

regional_boards.notes: Each regional board has same URL structure under main domain

water.ca.gov.description: Department of Water Resources - water supply, groundwater, flood management

water_basics.notes: General water education - agriculture, conservation, groundwater, drought

what_we_do.notes: DWR activities - dam safety, emergency management, flood prep, water storage

programs.notes: SWP, Bay Delta, Groundwater Management, Climate Change programs

programs_groundwater_sgma.notes: SGMA implementation, GSP review, basin prioritization

programs_water_use_efficiency.notes: Urban water use efficiency, conservation legislation implementation

news.notes: Current conditions, news releases, public notices

sgma_portal.notes: SGMA portal - GSP tracking, basin info

epa.gov.description: US Environmental Protection Agency - federal drinking water and water quality standards

ground_water_drinking_water.notes: Hub for federal drinking water info - lead, PFAS, contaminants, SDWA

dwstandardsregulations.notes: Drinking water standards and regulations table

lead.notes: Lead in drinking water, Lead and Copper Rule

dwsrf.notes: Federal Drinking Water State Revolving Fund

oehha.ca.gov.description: Office of Environmental Health Hazard Assessment - public health goals for drinking water chemicals

water_phgs.notes: Public Health Goals (PHGs) for chemicals in drinking water

water_phg_list.notes: Complete list of PHGs by chemical

root.notes: Interactive tool for checking local water quality - beach, drinking, swimming

leginfo.legislature.ca.gov.description: California legislation text - bills, codes, statutes

bill_search.notes: Bill lookup by ID - URLs contain bill_id parameter, may change across sessions

validation.notes: FEMA MSC (500) is transient server error. USDA RD timeout is intermittent. SMARTS redirect to login is expected.
